author: Staff Reporter
text:
An awareness camp for micro, small and medium business entrepreneurs hailing from the SC/ ST community will be organised at THUDITSSIA Hall here on March 2.

Likeminded entrepreneurs would be exposed to business opportunities, loan schemes to economically support them and project preparation and marketing links, Collector M. Ravikumar said in a statement on Monday.

The programme would be organised by the District Industries Centre in association with Dalit Indian Chamber of Commerce and Industry. During the schedule, officials from DIC, TAHDCO, Tamil Nadu Industrial Investment Corporation, SIDCO, officials from NABARD and other banks and National Small Industries Corporation would explain potential trades and their benefits with support of loan subsidy schemes.

Hence, the entrepreneurs, who wished to participate in the programme, could contact cell phones – 9884886772, 9443158129 and 8189843973 and register their names without any fee, the statement added.
title: Camp for SC/ ST entrepreneurs
